text: hi guys I'm Laura Vitale and on this
episode of Laura in the kitchen I'm
going to show you how I make my
spaghetti with the freshest and most
simple marinara sauce in the entire
world this is my go-to sauce all summer
long because tomatoes are in season and
look how beautiful these cherry tomatoes
are so that's what I'm going to be using
I'm gonna be using some beautiful fresh
cherry tomatoes that I've have some
fresh basil a lot of garlic some
spaghetti of course some pepper good
quality extra virgin olive oil and of
course I'm parmigiano to put on top but
that's completely optional so the first
thing you wanna do is get your pot ready
with some boiling water for your pasta
and now we're gonna get going on the
sauce in this big skillet here with high
sides I've got a few tablespoons of
extra virgin olive oil and I have it
preheat I just turn it on to about
medium heat now to this I'm going to add
in my garlic and now I'm adding my
garlic to cold oil because I want to
infuse the oil with the garlic flavor so
if I was just putting garlic into hot
oil I would get the essence of the
garlic but I wouldn't get it fully like
you know in with the oil infused and
with the oil which I want that because I
want that flavor to run through the
entire sauce so I'm gonna just heat that
up for a few minutes or until becomes
really fragrant and the garlic is a
lightly golden brown color add my
tomatoes look at gorgeous this is my
go-to sauce all summer I mean look at
that and it tastes divine sweet fresh
mmm salt and pepper I'm gonna let this
cook for about 20 minutes on medium heat
now after 10 minutes I'm going to add my
pass that's my boiling water so while
this is done the pass is also done and
then I pull pull the whole thing
together my sauce is done I also cooked
up my pasta and drained and I put back
into the same pot just because it's
easier to toss everything in if you
could smell this it's just
like summer to me big handful of torn
basil leaves and just mix this all
together
oh yeah look at that that is just mmm

some of the cherry tomatoes now of

for right now I just really want to

what is spaghetti because I want that

but this is going to be really hot just

that is perfect I don't even think it
